title: Bug 19089 - No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089 - No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: When working in a Java editor in Photon version, there is no popup menu visible when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler.
EB: 1) Open a Java editor.2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. A popup menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints/marks, etc. However, in the current situation, this menu does not appear.
SR: 1) Open Photon version.2) Open any Java file in the Java editor.3) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.4) Observe that there is no popup menu appearing.5) Expected behavior is that a menu should appear, providing options to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
